languages.text: Melee attacks with this weapon deal (5 x Burning level of target)% increased damage.

traits.locale_text: Melee attacks with this weapon deal (5 x Burning level of target)% increased damage.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Melee attacks{/g} from this weapon against {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} targets deal +<u>(5 × target's burning level)</u>% more damage.
languages.original_text: Атаки из этого оружия в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} по горящим целям наносят на <u>(5 × уровень {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} цели)</u>% больше урона.

traits.locale_text: Melee attacks from this weapon against burning targets deal +<u>(5 × target's burning level)</u>% more damage.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Yanan{/g} hedeflere bu silahla yapılan {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırıları{/g}, +%<u>(5 × hedefin yanma seviyesi)</u> kadar daha fazla hasar verir.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Melee attacks{/g} from this weapon against {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} targets deal +<u>(5 × target's burning level)</u>% more damage.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Yanan{/g} hedeflere bu silahla yapılan {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırıları{/g}, +%<u>(5 × hedefin yanma seviyesi)</u> kadar daha fazla hasar verir.
Bu silahla yapılan yakın dövüş saldırıları, +%<u>(5 × hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} seviyesi)</u> kadar daha fazla hasar verir.

languages.text: Los ataques {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} efectuados con esta arma contra objetivos con {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} infligen un +<u>(5 × nivel de quemadura del objetivo)</u> % más de daño.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Melee attacks{/g} from this weapon against {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} targets deal +<u>(5 × target's burning level)</u>% more damage.

traits.locale_text: Los ataques cuerpo a cuerpo efectuados con esta arma contra objetivos con quemadura infligen un +<u>(5 × nivel de quemadura del objetivo)</u> % más de daño.

languages.text: 这把武器的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}命中{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}状态的目标时，造成的伤害提高<u>（5×目标燃烧等级）</u>%。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Melee attacks{/g} from this weapon against {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} targets deal +<u>(5 × target's burning level)</u>% more damage.

traits.locale_text: 这把武器的近战攻击命中燃烧状态的目标时，造成的伤害提高<u>（5×目标燃烧等级）</u>%。

languages.text: Quand une cible sous l'effet de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} est touchée par une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} avec cette arme, elle subit +<u>(5 × niveau de Combustion de la cible)</u> % de dégâts.

traits.locale_text: Quand une cible sous l'effet de Combustion est touchée par une attaque de mêlée avec cette arme, elle subit +<u>(5 × niveau de Combustion de la cible)</u> % de dégâts.

languages.text: この武器の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}のターゲットに対して+<u>（5×ターゲットの炎上レベル）</u>%の追加ダメージを与える。
